location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 95: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Samuel Manesty informs Edward Galley that the PantherSnow is proceeding to Bushire on her return to Bombay, with public packets from the Court of Directors. Manesty states that he has taken charge of the Company's factory and affairs at Bussora [Basra].
